text: Arrived in Perth ahead of tomorrow's Community Cabinet and looking forward to meeting West Australians. JG
Norwegian military efforts have helped to save lives in Libya. Statement by the Storting at 10 o'clock http://bit.ly/cMp8h
Sathit says the government is ready to help the UDD suffer 3 southern provinces.
1. The province will use the existing advance payment. If there is not enough room for further approval (continued)
2. The Department of Disaster Prevention and Mitigation, mobilizing boats, engines, boats, rafts and pumps from Bangkok and the central area to help (less)
3. Food and Drinking Water A budget of 20 million baht will be allocated to distribute survival bags and drinking water to the public.
On March 31st at 9pm, there will be a donation program on Channel 9 Modern Nine TV (Team).
I am speaking at Villa Vigoni on European Higher Education on April 3rd.
Visited The Beaufort Street Merchant in Perth today & saw how they're using the web to drive business http://ow.ly/4oHFO TeamJG
I will speak about what makes European Higher Ed appealing to other countries, especially Islamic countries.
Met with students at the Moscow Power Engineering Institute. Had a good conversation about the profession's prestige, education, and jobs.

Our master: National unity is sacred, and there is no alternative to dialogue to reach consensus on the foundations of comprehensive reform, which meets the aspirations of all. #WeAreAllJo

We do not fear reform, and we will respect the recommendations of the National Dialogue Committee regarding any constitutional amendments to the development of parliamentary and party life. #WeAreAllJo
Master: Subversion and chaos is unacceptable and is red line #WeAreAllJo
We have a golden opportunity to advance Jordan, and we have repeatedly stressed that there is nothing to fear in our quest for reform, our national goals and aspirations.
His Majesty: National unity is sacred, no alternative to dialogue for consensus on comprehensive reform #WeAreAllJo
His Majesty: We do not fear reform & will respect Dialogue committee's recommendations on amendments related 2 parliamentary life. #WeAreAllJo
His Majesty: Allegiance & reform are of equal importance to us as we all go down same path & seek the best future 4 Jordan #WeAreAllJo
His Majesty: Vandalism and chaos are rejected and a red line. #WeAreAllJo
His Majesty: Golden opportunity lies ahead, I reiterate we have nothing 2 fear in appeavor 2 fulfillment reform, national goals #WeAreAllJo
Reform & loyalty go hand in hand. They give us a sense of belonging. They show we are all on the same side. #WeAreAllJo
Our national loyalty is TO all Jordanians. Our national reform is for all Jordanians. #WeAreAllJo

Every Jordanian and his different views and views and the way to express his opinion part of the national fabric is strong, and the Jordanian plan adorns every important man, and the neck of every creature .. #WeAreAllJo
We will not shed a single thread of our national fabric #WeAreAllJo

I visited Tokat yesterday. I did not know the historical identity of the city was so strong. http://twitpic.com/4g5sq8
When I was reminded that the 17th century was the third largest export center of the empire, I looked at the places I visited with a different perspective.
Of course the city was then a very important center on the Silk Road. http://twitpic.com/4g5ulq
In Taşhan, the tea was traditionally handled, and the children were nice. http://twitpic.com/4g5vxy
All the historical works which are disappearing if they are satisfactory are restored by the foundations and brought back to the city.
